page.title: 06HOUSING:CROWMARSH/BROOKMEAD
page.content: Housing in{Crowmarsh}consists of a variety of house types.They are quite modern and exhibit a variety of styles. They are medium sized,detached and semi-detached with garages and large gardens .Building materials are mainly brick and tiles.At Chalmore Gardens large detached houses can be found.Built of brick and tiles they are about 40 years old.Very large gardens stretch down to the Thames.Housing in{Brookmead Drive} was built in the 1960s.All the houses are of brick and tile,they are detached or semi-detached with garages and moderate sized gardens.The estate consists of about 60 houses and is part of Wallingford.
